title: Silver Axe
summaries: The Silver Axe is an early game Axe, being stronger than the Iron or Lead Axe, and weaker than the Gold or Platinum Axe. It has an alternative version, the Tungsten Axe, which is slightly stronger. Like all Axes, it is used to cut down Trees, Cacti and Giant Glowing Mushrooms.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.
